This Privacy Policy explains how Brick Gigil (‚Äúthe Game‚Äù, ‚Äúwe‚Äù, ‚Äúus‚Äù, or ‚Äúour‚Äù) handles information about you. We are committed to protecting your privacy and designing the Game in a way that respects data protection laws, including the EU/EEA GDPR and US children‚Äôs privacy rules such as COPPA.
By downloading or playing Brick Gigil, you agree to this Privacy Policy.
1. About Brick Gigil # Brick Gigil is a brick breaker mobile game suitable for all ages. The Game is designed to be played offline and does not require an internet connection for normal gameplay. 2. No Data Collection # During normal gameplay, we do not collect, store, or process any personal data.
Specifically:
No user accounts are required. No names, emails, phone numbers, or contact details are collected. No location data is collected. No device identifiers (e.g., advertising IDs) are tracked. No analytics, tracking, or advertising SDKs are used. No data is shared with third parties. All game-related information (scores, level progress, settings) stays on your device. We cannot access it, and it is not sent to our servers.
Because we do not process personal data in normal gameplay, no GDPR legal basis is needed, and there is no profiling or automated decision-making.
3. No Internet Requirement # The Game does not require an internet connection to play. The Game does not automatically send any information. No unnecessary device permissions are requested. Offline play is fully supported. 4. Optional Level Suggestion via Email # The only time information may be shared is if you choose to send a level suggestion via email:
Arrange bricks in the Game. Tap ‚ÄúSend / Suggest Level,‚Äù which opens your email app with a draft. The draft may include the level layout in the email body. You can edit or delete everything before sending. Sending the email is entirely optional. Important:
The Game itself does not send any emails. Emails are sent from your account to: [Contact Email]. If you send an email, we may see: The level content and comments Your email address or any info you include We will only use this to:
Review/manage your suggestion Improve the Game Optionally contact you if needed We do not use this info for advertising, profiling, or selling data. Under GDPR, your consent is the legal basis for any personal data shared.
To request deletion, contact: [Contact Email].
5. Children‚Äôs Privacy (COPPA / GDPR-Kids) # Suitable for all ages, minimal data collection. No personal info is knowingly collected from children. Offline play ensures no accounts or online communication. Optional email suggestions:
If a child sends an email, it may include their address or content. Parents can supervise or restrict email access. Deletion requests for such emails can be sent to: [Contact Email]. 6. User Rights (EU/EEA & UK) # Normally, no personal data is collected, so there‚Äôs usually nothing to access, correct, or delete.
If you sent an email containing personal data, your rights include:
Access: Know what we hold. Rectification: Correct inaccurate info. Erasure: Delete your data. Restriction: Limit use of your data. Objection: Object to certain processing. Portability: Request a copy in a usable format. Contact: [Contact Email]. Verification may be required.
7. Third-Party Services # Brick Gigil:
Uses no third-party analytics SDKs Displays no ads Integrates no social media plugins Uses no third-party logins Emails are processed only by your email provider and ours, both governed by their own privacy policies.
8. Data Security # Gameplay data stays on your device; no server database exists. Basic device security (passcodes, biometrics) is recommended. Emails sent to us are stored securely in our account with standard protections. 9. International Use # The Game can be used worldwide. Any voluntarily sent emails are handled according to this Privacy Policy. EU/EEA, UK, or other regions with data protection laws can contact us with compliance questions. 10.
